title: Search UICcareers.com | Engineering Career Center | University of Illinois at Chicago

Employers can post internships, co-ops and permanent full-time positions year-round on UICcareers.com. On-campus positions at both the East and West campuses are posted to the site as well.  Make the most of UICcareers.com   Be sure to update your profile since employers will search student profiles within UICcareers.com  Keep your resume updated on UICcareers.com because employers request resume packets to find and recruit UIC students  Be sure to set up job alerts to help UICcareers.com work for you  Set up individual career advising appointments through UICcareers.com       Already registered?  Log in to start searching       How to activate your account           How to apply to postings          All set?
